story_text: Whiskers the cat wondered where the whistling sound was coming from.
When he peeked outside, he saw Wheeler the owl whirling on his swing.
story_images: A curious cat with whiskers looking puzzled, surrounded by question marks, as the background shows notes depicting whistling sounds.
An owl named Wheeler with large, expressive eyes, swinging on a wooden swing hung from a tree branch, looking quite happy in daylight.

questions.question: What sound was Whiskers the cat curious about?
Who did Whiskers see when he looked outside?
